channel.title: math.SP updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SP updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On the Calculus of the Spectrum of the Laplacian for functions in Lens Spaces
item.description: arXiv:2411.03525v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this work we improve upon a formula for the computation of the dimensions of eigenspaces of the Laplace operator on functions, on Lens Spaces with the standard constant curvature metric.
item.dc:creator: Gedeana Pantoja da Silva, Alexandre Casassola Gon\c{c}alves, Rafael Ferreira da Silva

item.title: A remark on the absence of eigenvalues in continuous spectra for discrete Schr\"{o}dinger operators on periodic lattices
item.description: arXiv:2411.03577v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove a Rellich-Vekua type theorem for Schr\"{o}dinger operators with exponentially decreasing potentials on a class of lattices containing square, triangular, hexagonal lattices and their ladders. We also discuss the unique continuation theorem and the non-existence of eigenvalues embedded in the continuous spectrum.
item.dc:creator: Kazunori Ando, Hiroshi Isozaki, Hisashi Morioka
